data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Tororo who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tororo, Uganda

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Tororo to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Tororo, Uganda so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Tororo, Uganda that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Nubian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Tororo, Uganda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Tororo against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Tororo. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

location.name: Tororo
location.people_groups_list: Swahili, Nyang'i, Arab, Lebanese, Kalenjin, Pokot, Meneng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Swahili (5,100), Nyang'i (18,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Meneng (7,800)
